Text:
Thanks for uploading this great work of fiction!

As long as you accept it for the nonsense that it is; it's full of violence, sex, murder, rape, genocide, theft, incest, and homo-erotic relations.

Much more gripping than Homer.

lostinlodos show once again that the most evangelical people are the atheists, but they are damn bad at it.
Attacking people's beliefs systems this way will only strengthen them, never persuade them. So good luck with that.
Trying to beat on a persons faith only strengthens it. Logic, reasoning, and intelligence work much better than sarcasm and belittling. Tolerance helps as well.
